title: Coronavirus: London bus travel now free and as passengers told to used middle-doors after 26 TfL staff die from virus
description: London mayor Sadiq Khan hails 'heroic' transport workers – and says he's heartbroken over bus drivers who have died from Covid-19
content:
Passengers will be allowed to board Londons buses for free and banned from using the front door as part of new pandemic measures announced by Transport for London (TfL).
